long_description: The Teva Tanza leather sandals provide a plush, luxurious feel without sacrificing the functionality of your favorite water sandal. Nubuck leather uppers provide dependable performance with a touch of everyday style. Drain Frame(TM) design lets water out like a sieve, saving you from the misery of waterlogged sandals. Adjustable, padded instep, toe and heel straps supply a secure and easy fit via rip-and-stick tabs. Neoprene linings wick moisture away from your feet and dry quickly to keep feet comfortable. Super-soft, Mush(R) Infused EVA topsoles provide luxurious padding underfoot; Microban(R) zinc-based antimicrobial treatment deters odors. EVA midsoles offer supportive cushioning; polyurethane Shoc Pad(TM) in the heels boosts shock absorption at point of impact. Nylon shanks in the Teva Tanza leather sandals provide stability for handling uneven terrain. Nonmarking Spider Rubber(R) outsoles boast a versatile lug design for exceptional handling in wet environments.
short_description: The Teva Tanza leather sandals provide a plush, luxurious feel without sacrificing the functionality of your favorite water sandal.
